How to Use

  1. Pick your favorite: Open this HTML file in a browser to see all options
  2. Convert to ICO/PNG: Use an online converter like CloudConvert
  3. Generate multiple sizes: Create 16x16, 32x32, 48x48, 128x128, 256x256 for Windows
  4. Set in PyQt6: Use setWindowIcon(QIcon('path/to/icon.ico'))
